title: Specialized’s Holiday Gift Guide – Goodies for Every Cyclist
content:
Few brands have as comprehensive a catalog of bikes, components, tools, kit, helmets, and accessories as Specialized. So, for the Super Fan, or just anyone looking for a great quality cycling gift to give or get, here are their current faves for nearly every category… Air Tool Big Bore Pump Designed for Fat and Semi

The post Specialized’s Holiday Gift Guide – Goodies for Every Cyclist appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
